titles.title: To require the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to establish a veterans conservation corps, and for other purposes.
Veterans Conservation Corps Act of 2019
Veterans Conservation Corps Act of 2019
Veterans Conservation Corps Act of 2019

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs, and in addition to the Committees on Transportation and Infrastructure, the Judiciary, and Science, Space, and Technology, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
